Description: Rim sherd of Simple Animal Style Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; traces of added red and white bands; top of rim glazed; exterior: dots between two dilute bands; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.13)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0975) (phase 2)
